title: Damaged Discography Australian Metal Band VBR
description:
Damaged was a heavy metal band from Ballarat in Victoria, Australia that was formed in 1989. Damaged referred to its brand of music as "Hate Core", possibly best described as a violent mixture of grindcore, death metal, black metal and hardcore punk.

Included in this torrent are the original 1st demo "The Art Of Destroying Life" & a remixed version of "Passive Backseat Demon Engines" which was released with a reprint of Do Not Spit as bonus tracks. "The Art" is ripped from a tape & the first 10 seconds of tape was a little chewed up but apart from that it sounds fine.

Folders-

1992 - The Art Of Destroying Life
1993 - Do Not Spit
1995 - Passive Backseat Demon Engines
1997 - Token Remedies Research
2000 - Purified In Pain
2001 - Passive Backseat Demon Engines - Remixed

Plz seed & comments welcome

Enjoy
